Package org.roug.osnine

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Acia
    Interface from I/O system to Acia chip.
    Bus8Motorola
    Bus in a computer - Motorola-style.
    MemoryBus
    Bus in a computer - Motorola-style.
    PIAOutputPins
    Interface for letting a PIA 6821 connect output pins to other circuitry.
    Register
    Register interface.
    Signal
    Interface for sending a one bit signal to another component.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Acia6551
    Rockwell 6551 Asynchronous Communications Interface Adapter (ACIA).
    Acia6850
    Motorola 6850 Asynchronous Communications Interface Adapter (ACIA).
    AciaConsoleUI
    Console User Interface for Acia chips.
    AciaGraphicalUI
    Graphical user interface for Acia chip.
    AciaTelnetUI
    A service to handle telnet connections.
    AciaTextPaneUI
    Graphical user interface for Acia chip using JTextPane.
    BusStraight
    Straight-through bus with no memory management unit.
    Console
    Simple debugging console.
    DisAssembler
    Disassembles 6809 code one instruction at a time.
    HWClock
    Access to the host clock.
    IRQBeat
    Cause a periodic interrupt to the CPU.
    JarFileLoader
    Utility class to load external Java packages.
    Loader
    Load data into memory from files.
    MC6809
    Implementation of the Motorola 6809 MPU.
    MemoryRemap
    Remap memory locations.
    MemorySegment
    Abstract class for any type of memory - ROM, RAM or device.
    OptionParser
    Parsing command line arguments passed to programs.
    PIA6821
    Peripheral interface adapter.
    RandomAccessMemory
    RAM segment.
    ReadOnlyMemory
    ROM segment.
    RegisterBytePair
    Word size register (i.e. 16 bit).
    RegisterCC
    Condition codes register.
    UByte
    Byte size register (unsigned).
    USim
    Generic processor run state routines.
    USimIntel
    Word memory access routines for little-endian (Intel type).
    USimMotorola
    Word memory access routines for big-endian (Motorola type).
    V6809
    Emulator for 6809 CPU that is configured from properties file.
    VirtualDisk
    Virtualized block device.
    Word
    Word size register.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CC
    Condition code names.
